column4: Guys, I'm trying to install Quake 3 Arena demo on Xubuntu. When I enter 'sh linuxq3ademo-1.11-6.x86.gz.sh', a window pops up with the name "Quake III Arena Demo" and the message "Warning: unknown mime-type for "-r" -- using "application/octet-stream"
So, this version of Quake 3 Arena Demo is too old?
also try to unzip it first. gz = gunzip
